title: The Malice Hidden Behind the Masque

infobox.Title:: The Malice Hidden Behind the Masque
infobox.Japanese title:: 仮面劇に秘めた悪意  (Kamengeki ni Himeta Akui)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri
infobox.Animation director:: Shinaki Saitou  Rie Ogasawara  Nobuyuki Iwai
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Junko Yamanaka  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Keiko Han as Kinuko Shimizu  Minoru Inaba as Manabu Tabuchi  Toshiro Ishii as Hiroshi Komazuka  Kosuke Meguro as Atsushi Yabuki  Hiroki Takahashi as Robert Banno

sections.Situation: Kogoro is invited by the manager of a theater to investigate strange occurrences. While Conan goes off to investigate on his own, he overhears Hiroshi Komazuka, one of the main actors, plan on switching a fake rapier with a real one to murder Robert Banno, another main actor, in the sword fight scene of the play. Komazuka realizes Conan overheard him and traps him in a sarcophagus prop in the storage room. Robert sets up a trap on the stage in order to electrocute the actor named Atsushi Yabuki. When Robert learns that the fake rapier has been switched with the real one, he decides to pursue Yabuki to trade roles with him so he may murder Yabuki in person. Yabuki agrees and as Robert leaves, Yabuki reveals his plan to poison the wine Komazuka drinks during the play.
